title: Bale picking machine. pick up bales fast and easily.

tasks.task: ** Continuous operation of the potato digger
subtasks: * Checking and monitoring the potato digger's progress during operation
* Adjusting the depth and angle of the digger's forks as needed
* Clearing any obstructions or rocks from the furrows as they are unearthed
* Ensuring the digger's teeth are properly engaged to prevent damage to the potatoes
* Verifying the spacing between rows to maintain consistent planting depth

tasks.task: ** Harvesting potatoes from a field with a potato digger
subtasks: * Placing the potato digger's forks into the soil behind the tractor
* Driving the tractor through the rows at the correct speed to lift the potatoes safely
* Overseeing the cleaning process of the potatoes as they exit the digger
* Securing and guiding the dumped potatoes into the collection cart or trailer
* Ensuring the safety of infrastructure around the field, such as gates, when driving the digger

tasks.task: ** Transporting harvested potatoes to the storage facility
subtasks: * Loading the collection cart or trailer with freshly dug potatoes
* Weighing the total load before transporting to the storage area
* Positioning the trailer at the designated storage facility entrance
* Guiding the trailer into the loading dock safely to transfer potatoes into storage bins

tasks.task: ** Maintaining the potato digger and tractor equipment
subtasks: * Conducting daily inspections before each field operation
* Cleaning and lubricating moving parts of the digger and tractor
* Checking tire pressure and ensuring good grip on soil surfaces
* Replacing worn or damaged parts as needed

tasks.task: ** Checking for and addressing potential hazards in the field
subtasks: * Surveying the field for any signs of wildlife or pests that might have affected the crops
* Inspecting the rows for signs of disease or nutrient deficiencies in the potatoes
* Maintaining boundaries and fences to prevent unauthorized access or livestock damage
* Verifying that all safety signage is visible and understanding the messages they convey

tasks.task: ** Ensuring the operation complies with safety and environmental regulations
subtasks: * Abiding by local regulations on the use of pesticides and herbicides, if applicable
* Checking that the digger and tractor meet noise and emissions standards
* Ensuring proper disposal of any crop residues or debris

tasks.task: ** Operating the potato digger safely around other workers and equipment
subtasks: * Using hand signals or radios to coordinate with machine operators nearby
* Ensuring all workers are aware of the digger's movement path and speed

tasks.task: ** Post-harvest handling and management of potatoes in storage
subtasks: * Monitoring temperature and humidity levels in the storage facility
* Adjusting environmental controls to extend potato viability
* Periodically checking stored potatoes for signs of spoilage or mold

tasks.task: ** Preparing the field for the next planting season, including soil preparation
subtasks: * Collecting and composting any potato residues or planting materials
* Conducting soil tests to assess fertility and nutrient levels
* Implementing soil amendments based on test results to improve soil health
